trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Harper.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with Queen Elizabeth II and Prime Minister Brown. Attended the G-20 Economic Summit Meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the NATO Summit Meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended a working dinner for NATO leaders.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended U.S.-European Union Summit meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Gul and Prime Minister Erdogan; addressed the Grand National Assembly.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Talabani and U.S. military personnel.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Calderon.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the Summit of the Americas.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with King Abdullah

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Mubarak and delivered and address at Cairo University.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with Chancellor Merkel, visited the Buchenwald concentration camp and visited wounded U.S. military personnel.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Sarkozy and dedicated the new visitor center at the U.S. Military Cemetery in Normandy.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Medvedev and Prime Minister Putin.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the G-8 Summit Meeting. Also met with the leaders of Angola, Algeria, Australia, Brazil, China, Egypt, India, Mexico, Nigeria, Senegal, South Africa, and various international organizations.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Audience with Pope Benedict XVI.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Mills and addressed Parliament.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the North American Leaders’ Summit.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Addressed a session of the International Olympic Committee and met with Prime Minister Rasmussen.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with Emperor Akihito and Prime Minister Hatoyama.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the APEC Leaders’ Meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Hu, National People’s Congress Chairman Wu, and Premier Wen. Visited the Great Wall.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Lee.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with King Harald V and Queen Sonja. Received the Nobel Peace Prize.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the UN Climate Change Conference.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Karzai and addressed U.S. military personnel.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Signed Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty with Russia. Also met with the Presidents of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Latvia, and Romania; and with the Prime Ministers of Bulgaria, Croatia, the Czech Republic, Hungary, Lithuania, Poland, Slovakia, and Slovenia.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the G-8 and G-20 Economic Summit Meetings.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended U.S.-India Business and Entrepreneurship Summit in Mumbai. Met with Prime Minister Singh and President Patil. Addressed the Indian Parliament.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Yudhoyono.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Lee; attended the G-20 Summit Meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation’s CEO Summit Meetings.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the NATO and U.S.-European Union Summit Meetings.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with the leaders of the U.S. military and diplomatic missions and visited U.S. military personnel.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Roussef.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Pinera.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Funes.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President McAleese and Prime Minister Kenny. Visited ancestral home.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with Queen Elizabeth II, Prime Minister Cameron, and Labour Party leader Miliband.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the G-8 Economic Summit.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Komorowski and Prime Minister Tusk.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the G-20 Summit Meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Gillard. Announced a new military cooperation agreement.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the ASEAN and East Asia Summit Meetings.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the Nuclear Security Summit. Met with President Lee Myung-bak and visited the Demilitarized Zone.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the Summit of the Americas.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Karzai and addressed U.S. military personnel. Signed a long-term strategic partnership agreement.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the G-20 Economic Summit meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with King Bhumibol Adulyadej and Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Thein Sein, National League for Democracy leader Aung San Suu Kyi, and representatives of Burmese civil society.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Hun Sen and a U.S.-ASEAN Leaders’ meeting, a Trans-Pacific Partnership meeting, and the East Asia Summit meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Shimon Peres and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Mahmoud Abbas.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with King Abdullah II.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Enrique Pena Nieto.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Laura Chinchilla and leaders of the Central American Integration System.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Attended the G-8 Economic Summit Meeting.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Joachim Gauck and Chancellor Angela Merkel.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Macky Sall.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Jacob Zuma and with members of the Mandela family. Visited Robben Island.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with President Jakaya Kikwete. Laid a wreath at the memorial to the 1998 Embassy bombing.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Stopped during return to Washington.

trip.name: Barack Obama
trip.remarks: Met with King Carl XVI Gustaf and Prime Minister John Fredrik Reinfeldt.
